items.title: I Designed Algorithms at Facebook. Here’s How to Regulate Them.
items.abstract: Fixing how central they are to the platform’s content moderation could be the answer to its woes.

items.title: Showing the Algorithms Behind New York City Services
items.abstract: A city councilman is pushing to make public the code behind city decisions on everything from school assignments to trash collection.

items.title: Start-Ups Use Technology to Redesign the Hiring Process
items.abstract: Algorithms can help remove bias from the traditional résumé-sifting process and level the playing field for applicants.

items.title: How Game Theory Helped Improve New York City’s High School Application Process
items.abstract: As bad as many students and parents may think New York’s method of matching students and schools is, it was much worse before economists from Duke, M.I.T. and Stanford tackled it.

items.title: Forensic Architecture Founder Says United States Prevented His Visit
items.abstract: Eyal Weizman, the director of the investigative group, said an embassy official in London told him an algorithm had identified a security threat that was related to him.
keywords: Human Rights and Human Rights Violations
